alert.note: Alert for Beartooth Foothills; Livingston Area; Northern Park; Paradise Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 6:39PM MST until December 27 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow and cold wind chills. Additional snow accumulation of around 1 inch is possible. * WHERE...Portions of South Central Montana. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Snow and blowing snow will reduce visibility and make travel difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Arctic air and gusty winds will create bitterly cold wind chills of 15 to 20 below zero. These cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The combination of the light snow and cold temperatures is leading to icy travel conditions in spots. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at http://www.weather.gov/billings

area.areaDesc: Beartooth Foothills; Livingston Area; Northern Park; Paradise Valley
